column6: Charming farmhouse on Old Oaks Ranch, 365 acres in the beautiful rolling hills of the Brazos Valley. Enjoy hiking, gorgeous wild flowers, wildlife, privacy, peace and quiet. Ten acre lake and wooded trails 100 yards from the front door.\n\nGoing to Round Top? Come stay with us. We are 40 minutes away and you can sneak in the back way and avoid long lines of traffic.
